p: Hydrodistillation was carried out for two hours using a water-recycling, Clevenger-type apparatus accordingly to the European Pharmacopoeia [ 34]. The essential oil produced was collected from the apparatus as a fragrant yellowish oil. The oil was dried over anhydrous Na 2SO 4 before being stored under an inert atmosphere at 4 °C prior to analysis. The reported yields are the mean of two distillations ± standard deviation (SD).
